name: 林鈞陶
objective: 此課程為通訊理論之基礎課程，主要涵蓋內容為類比調變技術 (AM/FM/PM) 以及在雜訊存在時之效能分析。

(實際授課進度將根據教學狀況調整)
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Fourier Theory and Communication Signals
Week 3: Fourier Theory and Communication Signals
Week 4: Fourier Theory and Communication Signals
Week 5: First Midterm
Week 6: Amplitude Modulation
Week 7: Amplitude Modulation
Week 8: Phase and Frequency Modulation
Week 9: Phase and Frequency Modulation
Week 10: Phase and Frequency Modulation
Week 11: Second Midterm
Week 12: Random Variables and Processes
Week 13: Random Variables and Processes
Week 14: Random Variables and Processes
Week 15: Noise in Analog Modulation
Week 16: Noise in Analog Modulation
Week 17: Other Topics
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Weekly Quiz (HWs) 30%
Midterm I 20%
Midterm II 20%
Final 20%
Others 10%
